rationale: Initial creation of the audit trail to track all plan artifacts.
Defined ICP, market sizing, and competitive landscape based on BMA regulatory drivers.
Summary pitch focusing on the fee-based model and 60k profit target.
Established regulatory framework for BMA permits and condo contracts.
Defined key drivers for 60k profit target.
Monthly P&L showing path to profitability at 9 buildings.
Stress tested price and fuel risks.
Defined investment ask and repayment waterfall.
Detailed high-volume logistics and clustering strategy.
Investor deck outline.
Standard service agreement.
Operational quality checklist.
Strategic and operational risk mapping.
KPIs for monitoring success.
Final project root navigation.
Added Pricing Model Mismatch risk to address potential client preference for Lump Sum vs Unit pricing.
Updated BMA permit details (Sor.Por. 1) and solidified Yellow Plate requirement.
Calibrated vehicle, rent, and fuel costs based on market proxies (Isuzu NPR used market, Phra Khanong warehouse rates).
Defined Pilot Cluster (Phra Khanong-On Nut) with specific named targets (Sansiri/AP condos).
Cited specific BMA Ordinance 2019 and Sansiri/AP ESG goals.
Increased Ask to 1.5M THB to cover higher warehouse/vehicle lease assumptions.
Aligned Pitch Deck with 1.5M Ask and Pilot Cluster.
Final alignment of Ask (1.5M) and ROI (28 months).
Converted assumptions from CSV to JSON structure per investor request.
Converted projections from CSV to JSON for consistent data ingestion.
Pointed financial links to new JSON artifacts.
Adjusted governance checks to reference JSON assumptions file.
Made the investor data room self-contained by adding an internal audits folder.
Created evidence folder for source documents and snapshots.
Mirrored audits into the final data room so README links resolve.
Removed empty CSV to enforce JSON-only single source of truth.
Added investor-facing navigation index for the self-contained data room.
Added evidence folder conventions for investor diligence traceability.
Linked to DATA_ROOM_INDEX.md to guide investor reading order.
Created evidence register to track sourcing/validation of all material claims.
Tagged key claims with claim IDs and expanded evidence_register.json for traceability.
Added governance gate requiring evidence_register.json coverage for all material claims.
Tagged key investor claims with claim IDs for evidence traceability.
Archived older contract template to eliminate duplication; canonical templates are outreach_kit/service_agreement_12m.md and outreach_kit/pilot_SLA.md.
Archived legacy CSV artifacts (assumptions/projections) to keep the data room single-truth on model_inputs.json + generated JSON outputs.
Added standalone execution appendices (SOPs, GTM templates, pricing ladder, research briefs, pilot pack) so the data room can be shipped independent of the repo root.
